product_name: Amphipod Vizlet Triangle Reflectors - Pink - Package of 2
long_description: This package of 2 pink Amphipod Vizlet Triangle Reflectors makes it easy to add brilliant fluorescent color and reflectivity to your running attire for enhanced low-light visibility. Versatile magnetic closure makes it easy to wear on your waistband, hydration belt, pack strap, sleeve, collar, vest or hat. The Amphipod Vizlet Triangle Reflector weighs less 1/4 oz. for featherlight visibility.
short_description: This package of 2 pink Amphipod Vizlet Triangle Reflectors makes it easy to add brilliant fluorescent color and reflectivity to your running attire for enhanced low-light visibility.
